fields.name: Capacity_Units
fields.helpText: For purposes of blower design and selection, standard conditions shall be defined as an ambient air temperature of 68 F, barometric pressure of 14.5 psia, and a relative humidity of 0%.

fields.name: Inlet_Pressure_PSIG_Only_N2_Booster_apps
fields.fieldText: Inlet Pressure, PSIG (Only N2 & Booster apps)

fields.name: Max_Inlet_Temp_Design
fields.helpText: Standard compressors are rated from 32-115 F. Temperatures below 32 F will require low ambient protection, typically not available for water cooled units. Temperatures above 115 F will need specialty engineering review.

fields.name: Min_Inlet_Temp2
fields.helpText: Standard compressors are rated from 32-115 F. Temperatures below 32 F will require low ambient protection, typically not available for water cooled units. Temperatures above 115 F will need specialty engineering review.

If there are associated specifications with the project please reference them and attach to email request, specification review for project will be at agreed upon service levels.

textTemplates.name: UploadFileInfo
textTemplates.text: Attachments can be added with the button below or on the ETO RFQ review page. To add them here press the Upload Files button below for each file or attachment, and then Next to continue.
